這遊戲的玩家是製X是不是，遊戲伺服器爛成這樣所有玩家還揚揚得意的用LAG爽抓生存者，連線爛，遊戲建模爛成那樣，我還以為是手遊呢。玩家也是，也不好好要求官方弄好連線這種理所當然的事情，斗M，罵官方還真香過了好幾年了，其他玩家的批評直接一句官服就那樣阿，LAG是遊戲的一部分什麼X話。這遊戲的玩家素質可不可以這麼沒下限啊?比逗陣特工還爛，也不考慮其他電腦配備不好的玩家的立場。
直接坦白說，第五人格比黎明死線好多了，不管是建模還是玩家素質，我直接退費了，十年後連線弄好再考慮考慮。
強烈建議不要玩這遊戲，逼官方搞好連線才是真正健康的遊戲環境。

Divertido. Ótimo pra jogar com amigos. Dá medinho. 8/10

EDIT: 

Cada atualização vem com diversos bugs novos, o que pode gerar diferentes reações dependendo de quem joga, como por exemplo: angustia, alegria, raiva e diversão. Esses bugs levam tempo para serem corrigidos, e quando os antigos são consertados, novos aparecem.

A desenvolvedora não parece se preocupar com nada além do lucro, e tenta camuflar tal aspecto atendendo pedidos da comunidade no jogo, porém, acabam deixando a solução da real preocupação que se deve ter com o jogo de lado.

Entretanto, Dead by Daylight continua sendo recomendado por mim. Se você tiver autocontrole e amiguinhos pra jogar junto, acaba sendo bem divertido. 6,5/10
Шикарная игра чтоб повеселиться  с компанией,но злопоганные кемперы убивают на маньяках

realmente le meti un vicio a un punto que en 3 dias llevo 30 horas, pocos juegos dan esas pulsaciones como asesino o esos sustos y felicidad al escapar, pero el emparejamiento es realmente malo, muy abusivo con los nuevos, pues no es por nivel sino por rango, eso me parece fatal, pues perfecto te topas a una persona con 400 horas y tu con 2, la comunidad es totalmente blanco y negro, o son toxicos asquerosos o son seres de luz que jesus los tenga en su gloria.

hitbox do killer terrível, claramente acertei umas 5 vezes seguidas e não contou o dano. 

1 vez acontece, 2 é muito azar... 5... bom, ai meu amigo, é mal feito mesmo.
pela mor de Deus compra essa merda

Fully removed my initial review, to simply reflect on just a few things (cuz let's face it, nobody cares about any constructive opinion since 2018):

1. The game's an unbalanced piece of hot garbage.
2. Has one of the most toxic communities I've ever seen.
3. Dev team that only care about cash and listen to the cries of only one side of the community that provide most profit.
4. Lobbies that take 15+ minutes to get to?!
5. Constant app crashes every 15-20 minutes?! Do I have to make sure my PC is upgraded enough for one piece of hot garbage of a game or something? If it worked fine in 2018-2020, why should it it be any different now? Well, like i said - hot garbage. Worse than ever.
5. It's not even 10% fun while drunk.

BHVR, this project was so much fun before you took over. Maybe you all should get fired and get real jobs.

Sadly, games like Last Year, Hide Or Die, Friday The 13th, Home Sweet Home, etc were doomed to fail from the very start. And this is exactly why, despite having so many complaints about literally every little (or not) thing or issue, you see 50k players daily. The game lives on, community keeps on getting worse, good for nothing devs profit more and more, that no other game can come any close to compete with DBD. Truly sad sad reality we live in.
Dedicated servers needs fixing, much lagging. But I like the game lol

I hate this game. With a passion. Yet cannot break free from its grasp. Every time I think I have cast it into the depths for good, It claws its way back into my mind. It's too late for me, but it is not too late for you. Run. Hide. Escape. Once this game has you it does not let go.
Good multiplayer - based game. It can be a bit intense at first but you will always be doing something to keep you occupied.

Juego intenso para divertirse, requiere concentración,  atención a los detalles. Las partidas suelen ser variadas, se convierte en un juego adictivo ronda tras ronda y es muy bueno poder jugar en ambos lados: asesino y superviviente. Lo malo es que a veces tarda demaciado en encontrar partidas.
over all it's a thrilling game hunting or being hunted
you should play it unless your a keyboard smasher
It's a fun game if your playing with friends. So get it only if you have friends to play with

Absolute Amazing Game!  I've played this also for about 400 hours on PS4 and my time has been amazing!  Yes there is some bugs and glitches but if you enjoy unlocking stuff and playing with friends this game is perfect.  Lots of replay-ability!
